OOC: Sorry for not being able to post yesterday all. I've just read 
about 150 messages, but it's okay becuase most of them aren't about 
me.(*sob* nobody loves me...). And Iron Raptor, I don't mean to be 
rude or anything, but who gives you the right to make the scamatics 
for my weapon? Too late now, I'll go with it, but just e-mail me next 
time and I'll telly ou about what you want to know. I'm also gonna 
scratch the post where Gotron went to Dark One's help. I wasn't 
really following the battle, so I'm going to get him to do stuff with 
Starscream.

Vulois

Vulois looked the two Vok up and down. Powerful, but they should be 
able to beat them. He put his arm around Child and stared at the 
villains.

"This is my mountain, and will soon be a scared place of the Oracle! 
Leave now or feel our power withing!"
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix patted Ramulus on the back.

"I don't know. You were pretty goo up there. You came in when we 
needed it. A few more trips and and you'll get the hang of it. And we 
may need some more trips before this is done. Now what's this comp 
have to say?"
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream/Gotron

Starscream came out of his CR Chamber in the Alliance base. He 
thought about what he should do. He needing to know how his group was 
doing. He had been thinking about Phobia's action on the ship, and he 
wanted to save everyone and was willing t give his life, so he's 
valiant. That means he's probably not in with Megatron. He sent a 
message.

"Phobia, it's Starscream. I'm at the Alliance base. How is everyone 
doing? Did KitKat and Cave-In get their CR Chambers? And are we doing 
anything against Megatron?"

Starscream walked down the hall and entered the caf. He really had 
nothing to do until his group came to the Alliance, so he'd go hang 
out. When he go their though, he saw a familiar face.

"Gotron!"

"Starscream! What are you doing here?"

"A little ambassador stuff. What about you?"

"I'm Alliance, remember?"

"Oh yeah."

"Come. Have some energon with me."

The two sat down and started getting drunk.
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

Prebon kissed Spears. He had never felt like this before. She almost 
made him want to give up his real girl. Maybe he should put chips in 
all the fembots. He could be the player of the NBW!

"You mis-understand what were doing. We are only telling Ramulus that 
we will mett him in a few days. We are not taking Striker with us. 
When we get back, there will be plenty of time to say good-bye." He 
kissed Spears' again as Ignatius flew down.

"Now, if you hop on Ignatius we'll be ready to begin."

Meanwhile, Bullet went to the guard position by Striker's cell. He 
thouht to himself that with him here and Blaze controlling the cell 
guns that the only way this person could get out is if they were an 
ultimate strategist. Than again, Bullet is pretty stupid.
